125706f6-7995-44a3-bebc-2cc857f55c17.description: Earners of the "Basic Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform" badge have passed the L1 examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: General concepts of KNIME Analytics Platform, importing/exporting data, data manipulation, and data aggregation.
125706f6-7995-44a3-bebc-2cc857f55c17.name: Basic Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a multiple-choice examination (>70% correct answers) of KNIME Certification Program

cc100aed-0836-4bd1-a38e-477feb6995fc.description: Earners of the "Advanced Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform" badge have passed the L2 examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: Flow variables, Configuration nodes, workflow control, dates and times, and data visualization and exploration.
cc100aed-0836-4bd1-a38e-477feb6995fc.name: Advanced Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a multiple-choice examination (>70% correct answers) of KNIME Certification Program

a8f431a8-fb8a-4808-8c28-49f9ccb6616c.description: Earners of the "Proficiency in KNIME Software for Collaboration and Productionizing of Data Science" badge have passed the L3 examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: Deploying KNIME workflows as applications and services (REST), remote workflow execution, building reports, working with databases, collaboration (snapshots, permissions, data), and building Guided Analytics workflows for KNIME WebPortal.
a8f431a8-fb8a-4808-8c28-49f9ccb6616c.name: Proficiency in KNIME Software for Collaboration and Productionizing of Data Science

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a multiple-choice examination (>70% correct answers) of KNIME Certification Program

bb4ef0e3-b8c4-4c16-ab35-d3714ce855eb.description: Earners of the "Proficiency in KNIME Server Administration" badge have passed the KNIME Server Administration examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: General KNIME Software components and best practices, KNIME Server REST, KNIME Server storage, KNIME Server authentication, KNIME Server architecture, KNIME Server logs, KNIME Server configuration and distributed executors, and KNIME Server security.
bb4ef0e3-b8c4-4c16-ab35-d3714ce855eb.name: Proficiency in KNIME Server Administration

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a multiple-choice examination (>70% correct answers) of KNIME Certification Program

6eb72a4b-0759-423d-8b2c-50e0524ffc25.description: Earners of this badge successfully developed a project that delivered marketing analytics insights in the field of creative industries using KNIME Analytics Platform.
6eb72a4b-0759-423d-8b2c-50e0524ffc25.name: Finisher of the Business & Marketing Analytics Challenge “Analytics in Creative Industries” with KNIME - Fall 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Take the role of a junior marketing consultant and develop a project that focuses on at least two of the following areas: 1. Exploratory analysis to identify and create insightful visualization of characteristics and changes overtime, across or within a creative setting or industry. 2. Explanatory analysis between new constructs from (un)structured data and marketing constructs. 3. Predictive analysis of product/service characteristics and success via the development of solutions powered by AI.
The initiative is jointly organized by KNIME and the course Business and Marketing Analytics at LUISS Guido Carli University.

04b0e3e4-92fc-407c-b605-28282a9dfbdb.description: Contributors of the Month are KNIME community members who have increased the KNIME presence on social media or enabled a better learning experience as educators or provided technical help for fellow users on KNIME Forum or shared their experience via articles, blogs, and YouTube videos, or widened the landscape of the official KNIME nodes through newly developed nodes and components.
04b0e3e4-92fc-407c-b605-28282a9dfbdb.name: Contributor of the Month

badge_template_activities.title: Each month we highlight community members who are doing unique and interesting things with KNIME or are sharing useful data science tips and tricks.

8d49a8ca-37a1-4ee7-8030-9b9410c1f5d4.description: Earners of this badge successfully developed a project that delivered financial or HR insights using KNIME Analytics Platform.
8d49a8ca-37a1-4ee7-8030-9b9410c1f5d4.name: Finisher of the Data Science for Business Challenge "Finance & HR" with KNIME - Fall 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed a project with one of several industry partners who provided use cases, questions, and real data from their everyday work in Risk Management in Banking, Pricing for Insurance Companies, Marketing, Social Media Analytics, or Web Analytics. Leveraging prior KNIME knowledge earners have generated insights and presented them to the industry partners in multiple in-person sessions.
The initiative is jointly organized by KNIME and Prof. Tobias Schlüter within the Data Science for Business lecture at TH Köln.

d9ad3fd4-64fa-4fc7-92dc-25fb8e82c588.description: Earners of the "Text Processing in KNIME Analytics Platform" badge have passed the L4-TP examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: General text mining concepts, introduction to text processing and importing text, creating Document objects, parsing and tagging, cleaning and transforming text into numeric representations, and advanced applications, such as visualizations of world frequencies and topic modeling.
d9ad3fd4-64fa-4fc7-92dc-25fb8e82c588.name: Text Processing in KNIME Analytics Platform

38d43219-a6be-41e9-88b1-d7b2fd7353f1.description: Earners of this badge successfully developed a project that delivered marketing analytics insights using KNIME Analytics Platform. The outstanding implementation of data wrangling and advanced data mining techniques produced excellent results. The thorough documentation of the data collection process and efforts to ensure the suitability of the data underpinned the integrity of the project. The team demonstrated excellent presentation skills in communicating their results to the evaluation jury.
38d43219-a6be-41e9-88b1-d7b2fd7353f1.name: 1st Place in the Business & Marketing Analytics Challenge “Analytics in Creative Industries” with KNIME - Fall 2021

bd5b566f-2d02-490a-bf29-88375b898edf.description: Earners of this badge successfully completed the daily data exploration tasks through the #66DaysOfData challenge with KNIME, boosting their skills in data wrangling, data visualization, and visual programming.
bd5b566f-2d02-490a-bf29-88375b898edf.name: Finisher in the Data Exploration in #66DaysOfData with KNIME - Fall 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Data Exploration in #66DaysOfData challenges you to master the theory behind data manipulation, wrangling and exploration and use KNIME to perform those operations and display the data with the following visualization techniques: Histogram, Table View, Tile View, Pie/Donut Chart, Bar Chart, Scatter Plot, Sunburst Chart, Heatmap, Parallel Coordinates Plot, Box Plot, Conditional Box Plot, Stacked Area Chart, Line Plot, Tag Cloud.

1dccd6f8-723e-4151-94f1-1098295a62b8.description: Earners of this badge successfully developed a project that delivered marketing analytics insights using KNIME Analytics Platform. Implementation of data wrangling and mining techniques was highly satisfactory and produced informative marketing insights. The team demonstrated good presentation skills in communicating their results to the evaluation jury.
1dccd6f8-723e-4151-94f1-1098295a62b8.name: 3rd Place in the Business & Marketing Analytics Challenge “Analytics in Creative Industries” with KNIME - Fall 2021

a19995ef-92ab-4086-b0ac-f154148cab67.description: Contributors of the Month are KNIME community members who have contributed to increasing the KNIME presence on social media or enabling a better learning experience as educators or providing technical help for other fellow users on the KNIME Forum or sharing their experience via articles, blogs, and YouTube videos or widening the landscape of the official KNIME nodes through newly developed nodes and components.
a19995ef-92ab-4086-b0ac-f154148cab67.name: Contributor of the Month-April 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Francisco Villarroel Ordenes, Assistant Professor of Marketing and Director of the MSc. in Marketing at LUISS Guido Carli University. An expert in marketing analytics and NLP, he has taught such topics using KNIME software at several universities throughout his career. Together with a team at KNIME, he developed a live repository for ML in marketing analytics on the KNIME Hub with reusable solutions for customer churn, sentiment analysis, automated image analysis, SEO & CX.

e1e14d2e-412f-4548-beb0-43683132a535.description: Contributors of the Month are KNIME community members who have contributed to increasing the KNIME presence on social media or enabling a better learning experience as educators or providing technical help for other fellow users on the KNIME Forum or sharing their experience via articles, blogs, and YouTube videos or widening the landscape of the official KNIME nodes through newly developed nodes and components.
e1e14d2e-412f-4548-beb0-43683132a535.name: Contributor of the Month-February 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Nick Rivera aka NickyDee on YouTube has many video tutorials that represent an extensive, organised, easy to digest, and useful resource for newbies and expert KNIME users to progress in their knowledge of KNIME, including exploration of lookup IDs, pivoting and unpivoting, aggregations, conditional math, date and time operations, excel function translations, and many more data transformation and ETL operations.

4d588d03-c47e-433a-865b-32f9f6e17f3e.description: Contributors of the Month are KNIME community members who have contributed to increasing the KNIME presence on social media or enabling a better learning experience as educators or providing technical help for other fellow users on the KNIME Forum or sharing their experience via articles, blogs, and YouTube videos or widening the landscape of the official KNIME nodes through newly developed nodes and components.
4d588d03-c47e-433a-865b-32f9f6e17f3e.name: Contributor of the Month-January 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Prof. Malik Yousef, Head of Galilee Digital Health Research Center (GDH), Zefat Academic College, Israel. Malik has impacted DNA, mRNA, and miRNA analysis, gene ontology, and molecular biology with his research, as confirmed by a long list of publications in top, peer reviewed scientific journals, books, and US patents. He has developed ML algorithms to predict mRNA and their targets, analyse gene expression, and integrate mRNA and miRNA expression profile.

1b794d1f-4e54-4cf6-8c11-f218476a3418.description: Contributors of the Month are KNIME community members who have contributed to increasing the KNIME presence on social media or enabling a better learning experience as educators or providing technical help for other fellow users on the KNIME Forum or sharing their experience via articles, blogs, and YouTube videos or widening the landscape of the official KNIME nodes through newly developed nodes and components.
1b794d1f-4e54-4cf6-8c11-f218476a3418.name: Contributor of the Month-May 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Bruno Ng is a highly active member of the KNIME Forum and has also made many valuable contributions to the KNIME Hub in his public space. Bruno always engages other KNIMErs with the utmost courtesy and clarity. To date, he has created 1.9k posts, received 3.1k hearts, and provided 214 solutions.

badge_template_activities.title: Paul Wisneskey has written numerous blogs about KNIME. Paul explores whether he can teach his ML model to make a pass: throw the ball to a receiver in motion. Part 1 deals with Parameter Optimization with KNIME and Part 2: Trains a Neural Network.
